        public Translator(Settings settings)
           throws CastleException
        Constructor for the Translator instance
        Parameters:
        settings - The shared variables
        Throws:
        CastleException - If the translation file does not exist, if the setting "LANGUAGE" is not set or when the translation file is malformed

    • Method Detail

      • readTranslationFile

        public void readTranslationFile(String ISO639LanguageCode,
                                boolean isDefaultLanguage)
                         throws CastleException
        Reads the translation file for the language specified in the settings
        Parameters:
        ISO639LanguageCode - The ISO 639 letter code of the translation file to read
        isDefaultLanguage - True if the translation file is the default language
        Throws:
        CastleException - If the translation file does not exist, if the setting "LANGUAGE" is not set or when the translation file is malformed

      • translate

        public String translate(String stringToBeTranslated)
                 throws InvalidSettingKey,
                        NoSuchStringToTranslate
        Translates the string to another language
        Parameters:
        stringToBeTranslated - The string to be translated
        Returns:
        The translated string
        Throws:
        InvalidSettingKey - If the translations are not yet read from the file
        NoSuchStringToTranslate - If the string to be translated does not exist in the translations and fall back translation file

      • setFallBackLanguage

        public void setFallBackLanguage(String language)
                         throws CastleException
        Updates the fall back language and fall back translations
        Parameters:
        language - The language code of the fall back language
        Throws:
        CastleException - If the translation file does not exist, if the setting "LANGUAGE" is not set or when the translation file is malformed
